title: Chhattisgarh Adventure Tour 1
overview: Explore the beautiful adventure attractions of Chhattisgarh. This tour is designed to give you an immersive experience of Adventure Spot 1.

itinerary.title: Arrival
itinerary.desc: Arrive in Chhattisgarh and transfer to your hotel.

itinerary.title: Sightseeing
itinerary.desc: Full day exploring Adventure Spot 1 and nearby areas.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.desc: Breakfast and transfer to the airport/station.
